title: Escape From Duckov surpasses popularity of Battlefield 6 in indie shooter scene

scene_plan.wide_context: A montage of Escape From Duckov's gameplay, showcasing its unique mechanics and immersive world.
scene_plan.impact_close: Cut to a live feed on Steam showing the real-time player count for both games side by end each day at peak hours.

scene_plan.data_overlay: Numbers rise steadily, with Escape From Duckov's final tally surpassing Battlefield 6’s.
scene_plan.narration: @lee627 speaks calmly: 'Escape From Duckov has proven to be more popular than the AAA title on Steam.'

scene_plan.quiet_outro: The camera pans out, leaving a sense of wonder and excitement for Escape From Duckov's future.

sora_prompt.voiceover: @lee627 speaks calmly: 'Escape From Duckov has proven to be more popular than the AAA title on Steam.'
